captions.text: I want you to hear this song my baby

I can't let you go
I don't wanna cry again
Baby don't let me be alone
Baby don't let me be alone
It is raining outside the window
I am begging you to stay
But your voice is already cold
I end up letting you go
Baby don't let me be alone
Baby don't let me be alone
Your warmth left in my hand
I am begging you not to leave
But your cold face hurts me
Baby don't let me be alone
Baby don't let me be alone

I have too many regrets
I want you to back
Baby don't let me be alone

Just remember this
Don't forget me
Tonight.. Baby don't let me be alone
